main event: On 15 August 1968 at 0245Z, a bright light resembling a possible satellite was observed in West Carrollton, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds,The light was visible for 40 seconds,There were 4 confirmed witnesses,The observer described the light as being in the northeast section of the sky,The object did not leave any physical evidence.
sighted object: a bright light in the northeast sky
